resources.string: A blank canvas awaits! Every great army starts with a single model.
The foundations are set! The miniature is starting to show its character.
Over halfway there! The main colors are down and it already looks great on the table.
Just the final touches left! The details are what will make this piece truly shine.
Battle-ready and glorious! A masterpiece for your collection. Congratulations!
Oops its seems that your progress has any kind of error.
Mark the milestones you have reached in painting your miniature. Each milestone contributes to the total progress of the miniature and its sized based on the preferences of the app.
Please, update the painting progress of your miniature.
